name: Hash Brown Quiche (Paula Deen)
ingredients: 3 cups shredded frozen hash browns, thawed and drained
instructions: Press the hash browns between paper towels to dry as best as possible.
In a 9 inch pie plate, toss the hash browns with the butter and press into bottom and sides forming a crust.
Meanwhile combine rest of ingredients and mix in bowl.
Lower oven to 350 and bake 30 minutes until golden.
You can also use a bag of shredded potatoes from the refrigerator section.
